name: Hoek and Brown
description: Cross Platform app built using Nextron that allows to compute Hoek and Brown parameters for rock mass. The program has been compiled for linux and windows operating systems.

name: Personal Blog
description: A simple and functional blog built using NextJS framework and MongoDB for storage of comments with a featured section and provision to send a message.

name: E-Commerce Website
description: A template E commerce website design including a shopping cart, checkout and payment gateway, with a user authentication and registration as well as product reviews. Utilizing Django framework for backend and React for frontend.

name: Burger Builder
description: A burger builder app built using React and Firebase for authentication and storage of orders that are segregated by user. Responsive design with a drawer for mobile.

name: E-Commerce Shop
description: A shopping app built using React Native, Firebase for authentication and storage of orders and Redux for state management. Push Notifications implemented as well

name: Great Places
description: A mobile app that uses native device features such as Camera, Geolocation, and MapView to record a list of places by the user. Data is locally stored for each user.

name: Solidity Wave
description: A web app that uses React for the frontend and implements a Solidity contract. The contract in deployed on the Rinkeby testnet. Contract can be interacted with by 'Waving' at me through the website.

name: VR Website Template
description: A template for a VR website built using HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap. The website is responsive and can be viewed on mobile and desktop. No Dynamic content.

name: Whatsapp Bot
description: A simple whatsapp bot built upon the Baileys library that makes a socket connection. The bot can send messages, media, and stickers to the user based on certain commands.

name: PyBot
description: A contextual chatbot made using PyTorch and the NLTK Library for Python. The underlying model was converted into an API using Django with a frontend in ReactJS by me.

name: Machine Learning
description: A collection of machine learning projects that includes implementation of models from scratch such as linear regression and random forests.
